recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of yellowfin tuna steaks| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of garlic powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of onion powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of lemon juice| Untimed; None; Preheat air fryer to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Pat tuna steaks dry with paper towels| Untimed; None; Brush tuna steaks with olive oil| Untimed; None; Sprinkle garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper on both sides of the tuna steaks| Untimed; None; Place tuna steaks in the air fryer basket| Timed; 600; Cook in the preheated air fryer for 10 minutes, flipping halfway through| Untimed; None; Drizzle lemon juice over the cooked tuna steaks| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Air Fryer Yellowfin Tuna Steaks
